name: File Download with Headless Browser
description: This is an unusual method to download files. It starts a browser headless and downloads a file from a location. This can be used by threat actors to download files.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\msedge.exe OR *\\chrome.exe) AND process.command_line:*\-\-headless* AND process.command_line:*dump\-dom* AND process.command_line:*http*)`
